It pleased<S>6925</S> <S>8232</S> Darius<S>1868</S> to set<S>6966</S> over<S>5922</S> the kingdom<S>4437</S> an hundred<S>3969</S> and twenty<S>6243</S> princes<S>324</S>, which should be<S>1934</S> over the whole<S>3606</S> kingdom<S>4437</S>;
And over<S>5924</S> these<S>4481</S> three<S>8532</S> presidents<S>5632</S>; of whom<S>4481</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> was first<S>2298</S>: that<S>459</S> the princes<S>324</S> might<S>1934</S> give<S>3052</S> accounts<S>2941</S> unto them, and the king<S>4430</S> should have<S>1934</S> no<S>3809</S> damage<S>5142</S>.
Then<S>116</S> this<S>1836</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> was<S>1934</S> preferred<S>5330</S> above<S>5922</S> the presidents<S>5632</S> and princes<S>324</S>, because<S>3606</S> <S>6903</S> an excellent<S>3493</S> spirit<S>7308</S> was in him; and the king<S>4430</S> thought<S>6246</S> to set<S>6966</S> him over<S>5922</S> the whole<S>3606</S> realm<S>4437</S>.
Then<S>116</S> the presidents<S>5632</S> and princes<S>324</S> sought<S>1934</S> <S>1156</S> to find<S>7912</S> occasion<S>5931</S> against Daniel<S>1841</S> concerning<S>6655</S> the kingdom<S>4437</S>; but<S>3606</S> they could<S>3202</S> find<S>7912</S> none<S>3809</S> occasion<S>5931</S> nor<S>3809</S> fault<S>7844</S>; forasmuch<S>6903</S> as he was faithful<S>540</S>, neither<S>3809</S> was there any<S>3606</S> error<S>7960</S> or fault<S>7844</S> found<S>7912</S> in him<S>5922</S>.
Then<S>116</S> said<S>560</S> these<S>479</S> men<S>1400</S>, We shall not<S>3809</S> find<S>7912</S> any<S>3606</S> occasion<S>5931</S> against<S>5922</S> this<S>1836</S> Daniel<S>1841</S>, except<S>3861</S> we find<S>7912</S> it against him concerning the law<S>1882</S> of his God<S>426</S>.
Then<S>116</S> these<S>459</S> presidents<S>5632</S> and princes<S>324</S> assembled together<S>7284</S> to the king<S>4430</S>, and said<S>560</S> thus<S>3652</S> unto him<S>5922</S>, King<S>4430</S> Darius<S>1868</S>, live<S>2418</S> for ever<S>5957</S>. <sup>assembled: or, came tumultuously</sup>
All<S>3606</S> the presidents<S>5632</S> of the kingdom<S>4437</S>, the governors<S>5460</S>, and the princes<S>324</S>, the counsellors<S>1907</S>, and the captains<S>6347</S>, have consulted together<S>3272</S> to establish<S>6966</S> a royal<S>4430</S> statute<S>7010</S>, and to make a firm<S>8631</S> decree<S>633</S>, that whosoever shall ask<S>1156</S> a petition<S>1159</S> of<S>4481</S> any<S>3606</S> God<S>426</S> or man<S>606</S> for<S>5705</S> thirty<S>8533</S> days<S>3118</S>, save<S>3861</S> of thee<S>4481</S>, O king<S>4430</S>, he shall be cast<S>7412</S> into the den<S>1358</S> of lions<S>744</S>. <sup>decree: or, interdict</sup>
Now<S>3705</S>, O king<S>4430</S>, establish<S>6966</S> the decree<S>633</S>, and sign<S>7560</S> the writing<S>3792</S>, that it be not<S>3809</S> changed<S>8133</S>, according to the law<S>1882</S> of the Medes<S>4076</S> and Persians<S>6540</S>, which altereth<S>5709</S> not<S>3809</S>. <sup>altereth not: Cald. passeth not</sup>
Wherefore<S>3606</S> <S>1836</S> <S>6903</S> king<S>4430</S> Darius<S>1868</S> signed<S>7560</S> the writing<S>3792</S> and the decree<S>633</S>.
Now when Daniel<S>1841</S> knew<S>3046</S> that the writing<S>3792</S> was signed<S>7560</S>, he went<S>5954</S> into his house<S>1005</S>; and his windows<S>3551</S> being open<S>6606</S> in his chamber<S>5952</S> toward<S>5049</S> Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, he kneeled<S>1289</S> upon<S>5922</S> his knees<S>1291</S> three<S>8532</S> times<S>2166</S> a day<S>3118</S>, and prayed<S>6739</S>, and gave thanks<S>3029</S> before<S>6925</S> his God<S>426</S>, as<S>6903</S> <S>3606</S> he did<S>1934</S> <S>5648</S> aforetime<S>4481</S> <S>1836</S> <S>6928</S>.
Then<S>116</S> these<S>479</S> men<S>1400</S> assembled<S>7284</S>, and found<S>7912</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> praying<S>1156</S> and making supplication<S>2604</S> before<S>6925</S> his God<S>426</S>.
Then<S>116</S> they came near<S>7127</S>, and spake<S>560</S> before<S>6925</S> the king<S>4430</S> concerning<S>5922</S> the king's<S>4430</S> decree<S>633</S>; Hast thou not<S>3809</S> signed<S>7560</S> a decree<S>633</S>, that every<S>3606</S> man<S>606</S> that shall ask<S>1156</S> a petition of<S>4481</S> any<S>3606</S> God<S>426</S> or man<S>606</S> within<S>5705</S> thirty<S>8533</S> days<S>3118</S>, save<S>3861</S> of thee<S>4481</S>, O king<S>4430</S>, shall be cast<S>7412</S> into the den<S>1358</S> of lions<S>744</S>? The king<S>4430</S> answered<S>6032</S> and said<S>560</S>, The thing<S>4406</S> is true<S>3330</S>, according to the law<S>1882</S> of the Medes<S>4076</S> and Persians<S>6540</S>, which altereth<S>5709</S> not<S>3809</S>.
Then<S>116</S> answered<S>6032</S> they and said<S>560</S> before<S>6925</S> the king<S>4430</S>, That Daniel<S>1841</S>, which is of<S>4481</S> the children<S>1123</S> of the captivity<S>1547</S> of Judah<S>3061</S>, regardeth<S>7761</S> <S>2942</S> not<S>3809</S> thee<S>5922</S>, O king<S>4430</S>, nor the decree<S>633</S> that thou hast signed<S>7560</S>, but maketh<S>1156</S> his petition<S>1159</S> three<S>8532</S> times<S>2166</S> a day<S>3118</S>.
Then<S>116</S> the king<S>4430</S>, when he heard<S>8086</S> these words<S>4406</S>, was sore<S>7690</S> displeased<S>888</S> with himself, and set<S>7761</S> his heart<S>1079</S> on<S>5922</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> to deliver<S>7804</S> him: and he laboured<S>1934</S> <S>7712</S> till<S>5705</S> the going down<S>4606</S> of the sun<S>8122</S> to deliver<S>5338</S> him.
Then<S>116</S> these<S>479</S> men<S>1400</S> assembled<S>7284</S> unto<S>5922</S> the king<S>4430</S>, and said<S>560</S> unto the king<S>4430</S>, Know<S>3046</S>, O king<S>4430</S>, that the law<S>1882</S> of the Medes<S>4076</S> and Persians<S>6540</S> is, That no<S>3606</S> decree<S>633</S> nor statute<S>7010</S> which the king<S>4430</S> establisheth<S>6966</S> may be changed<S>8133</S>.
Then<S>116</S> the king<S>4430</S> commanded<S>560</S>, and they brought<S>858</S> Daniel<S>1841</S>, and cast<S>7412</S> him into the den<S>1358</S> of lions<S>744</S>. Now the king<S>4430</S> spake<S>6032</S> and said<S>560</S> unto Daniel<S>1841</S>, Thy God<S>426</S> whom thou<S>607</S> servest<S>6399</S> continually<S>8411</S>, he will deliver<S>7804</S> thee.
And a<S>2298</S> stone<S>69</S> was brought<S>858</S>, and laid<S>7761</S> upon<S>5922</S> the mouth<S>6433</S> of the den<S>1358</S>; and the king<S>4430</S> sealed<S>2857</S> it with his own signet<S>5824</S>, and with the signet<S>5824</S> of his lords<S>7261</S>; that the purpose<S>6640</S> might not<S>3809</S> be changed<S>8133</S> concerning Daniel<S>1841</S>.
Then<S>116</S> the king<S>4430</S> went<S>236</S> to his palace<S>1965</S>, and passed the night<S>956</S> fasting<S>2908</S>: neither<S>3809</S> were instruments<S>1761</S> of musick brought<S>5954</S> before<S>6925</S> him: and his sleep<S>8139</S> went<S>5075</S> from him<S>5922</S>. <sup>instruments: or, table</sup>
Then<S>116</S> the king<S>4430</S> arose<S>6966</S> very early<S>8238</S> in the morning<S>5053</S>, and went<S>236</S> in haste<S>927</S> unto the den<S>1358</S> of lions<S>744</S>.
And when he came<S>7127</S> to the den<S>1358</S>, he cried<S>2200</S> with a lamentable<S>6088</S> voice<S>7032</S> unto Daniel<S>1841</S>: and the king<S>4430</S> spake<S>6032</S> and said<S>560</S> to Daniel<S>1841</S>, O Daniel<S>1841</S>, servant<S>5649</S> of the living<S>2417</S> God<S>426</S>, is thy God<S>426</S>, whom thou servest<S>6399</S> continually<S>8411</S>, able<S>3202</S> to deliver<S>7804</S> thee from<S>4481</S> the lions<S>744</S>?
Then<S>116</S> said<S>4449</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> unto<S>5974</S> the king<S>4430</S>, O king<S>4430</S>, live<S>2418</S> for ever<S>5957</S>.
My God<S>426</S> hath sent<S>7972</S> his angel<S>4398</S>, and hath shut<S>5463</S> the lions'<S>744</S> mouths<S>6433</S>, that they have not<S>3809</S> hurt<S>2255</S> me: forasmuch as<S>3606</S> <S>6903</S> before<S>6925</S> him innocency<S>2136</S> was found<S>7912</S> in me; and also<S>638</S> before<S>6925</S> thee, O king<S>4430</S>, have I done<S>5648</S> no<S>3809</S> hurt<S>2248</S>.
Then<S>116</S> was the king<S>4430</S> exceeding<S>7690</S> glad<S>2868</S> for him<S>5922</S>, and commanded<S>560</S> that they should take<S>5267</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> up<S>5267</S> out of<S>4481</S> the den<S>1358</S>. So Daniel<S>1841</S> was taken up<S>5267</S> out of<S>4481</S> the den<S>1358</S>, and no<S>3809</S> manner<S>3606</S> of hurt<S>2257</S> was found<S>7912</S> upon him, because he believed<S>540</S> in his God<S>426</S>.
And the king<S>4430</S> commanded<S>560</S>, and they brought<S>858</S> those<S>479</S> men<S>1400</S> which had accused<S>399</S> <S>7170</S> Daniel<S>1841</S>, and they cast<S>7412</S> them into the den<S>1358</S> of lions<S>744</S>, them<S>581</S>, their children<S>1123</S>, and their wives<S>5389</S>; and the lions<S>744</S> had the mastery<S>5705</S> <S>7981</S> of them, and brake<S>1855</S> all<S>3606</S> their bones<S>1635</S> in pieces<S>1855</S> or ever<S>3809</S> they came<S>4291</S> at the bottom<S>773</S> of the den<S>1358</S>.
Then<S>116</S> king<S>4430</S> Darius<S>1868</S> wrote<S>3790</S> unto all<S>3606</S> people<S>5972</S>, nations<S>524</S>, and languages<S>3961</S>, that dwell<S>1753</S> in all<S>3606</S> the earth<S>772</S>; Peace<S>8001</S> be multiplied<S>7680</S> unto you.
I<S>4481</S> <S>6925</S> make<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S>, That in every<S>3606</S> dominion<S>7985</S> of my kingdom<S>4437</S> men tremble<S>1934</S> <S>2112</S> and fear<S>1763</S> before<S>4481</S> <S>6925</S> the God<S>426</S> of Daniel<S>1841</S>: for he is the living<S>2417</S> God<S>426</S>, and stedfast<S>7011</S> for ever<S>5957</S>, and his kingdom<S>4437</S> that which shall not<S>3809</S> be destroyed<S>2255</S>, and his dominion<S>7985</S> shall be even unto<S>5705</S> the end<S>5491</S>.
He delivereth<S>7804</S> and rescueth<S>5338</S>, and he worketh<S>5648</S> signs<S>852</S> and wonders<S>8540</S> in heaven<S>8065</S> and in earth<S>772</S>, who hath delivered<S>7804</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> from<S>4481</S> the power<S>3028</S> of the lions<S>744</S>. <sup>power: Cald. hand</sup>
So this<S>1836</S> Daniel<S>1841</S> prospered<S>6744</S> in the reign<S>4437</S> of Darius<S>1868</S>, and in the reign<S>4437</S> of Cyrus<S>3567</S> the Persian<S>6543</S>.
